original_title: The Influence of Ocular Light Perception on Metabolism in Man and in Animal
overview: A found footage film, which uses an Italian Sixties softporn soundtrack, which is repeated twice. Each time a sequence of images is synched to the soundtrack. The film images are illustrating acts of ocular light perception as well as imagery with strong visual impact. It is a kind of visual test directed towards the viewer.
title: The Influence of Ocular Light Perception on Metabolism in Man and in Animal
